quote: If you go out looking for friends, you're going to find they are very scarce. If you go out to be a friend, you'll find them everywhere. – Zig Ziglar
fact: The first song played on Armed Forces Radio during operation Desert Shield was "Rock the Casba" by the Clash.
joke: What do you call cheese by itself? Provolone.
